p: PLA solutions for electrospinning were prepared by dissolving the polymer in acetone at a concentration of 14% w/ v. Clary sage essential oil (CS-EO) or black pepper essential oil (BP-EO) were then added to the PLA/acetone solutions. Concentration of 5.0, 7.5, 10.0 and 15.0% v/ v of essential oils were used. PLA solutions containing linalyl acetate, α-pinene, limonene or β-caryophyllene were prepared by dissolving 14% w/ v PLA in acetone and then adding 10% v/ v of the chemical compound.
